Challenge yourself in Challenge factory
Learning together

Challenge Factory is a concept for working as a summer trainee for the N4S Project in JAMK University of Applied Sciences. As a Challenge Factory member you get to work with N4S@JAMK team. N4S@JAMK team acts as mentors within Challenge Factory and gives several challenges to seize with modern working methods. LEAN Startup Methodolody, MVP, QA, Test Automation, CI and CD, Service Design, UX... did we get you interested? Send us an email!

Watch the video

We are looking for talents all the time. If you have the urge to stay on top of the IT evolution, we would like to hear from you. And if you just want to come and say hello, we are in with that also. Let's improve the process of software delivery together. We have coffee, you can bring some korvapuusti!
